param.label: A tabular dataset with the following columns ...

param.help: Choose from the already defined studies. See below.

options.transform_lines: [ "%s%s%s:%s" % ( l[0], self.separator, l[0], l[1][:40] ) for l in obj ]

param.name: mimetype
param.label: mimetype for the data object.
param.help: Choose from the following. See below.

tool.help:
Will read in a tsv file with the following columns::
study path data_sample mimetype size sha1
TEST01 file:/share/fs/v039303.cel V2902 x-vl/affymetrix-cel 39090 E909090 ....
Records that point to an unknown data sample will be noisily ignored. The same will happen to records that have the same path of a previously seen data_object
